content:
With the latest publisher, I'm seeing a new error in SDC: "The structure definition constrains a kind of complex-type, but has a different kind (logical)"

I don't know what it means. I'm guessing it's yelling because I'm using complex FHIR data types in a logical model, but I thought that was allowed?
hmm. I didn't consider logical models when I wrote that rule. it was picking up a series of accidents I found, that were causing other problems
to my knowledge, we've never characterised the restrictions that apply to structure definition specializations.
If I need to make changes, happy to do so. Just not sure what to change.
